meanings.definition: The process of producing printing plates by photographic methods.
meanings.sent1: The photoengravings were used to create the plates for the new book.
meanings.sent2: I admired the intricate photoengravings in the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The photoengravings decided to take a group selfie.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like photoengravings etched in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The photoengravings on the wall captured the essence of the city.

meanings.definition: An image or design produced by photoengraving.
meanings.sent1: The photoengravings on the poster were eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: She framed the beautiful photoengravings in her living room.
meanings.sent3: The photoengravings at the art exhibit seemed to wink at the viewers.
meanings.sent4: His words were like photoengravings etched in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The photoengravings on the cover of the book drew me in.
